name: Indienburg Consulting
tag_list: it, sap, oracle, ebs, global, consulting, management, talent-acquisition, fmcg, retail, supply-chain
overview:
Indienburg Consulting established in the year of 2010 is an Information Technology enabled Management Consulting company focused on implementing Integrated Enterprise Solutions with simultaneously providing resources and training.

GTA Division:

Through Global Talent Acquisition Division we support SAP/ Oracle EBS implementations of major corporations, consultancies and with committed delivery into both contract and permanent strategic vacancies across the India, Middle East-North Africa, Africa and Asia-Pacific.

MIR Division:

We are specialized in providing in-depth market intelliegence on four industry verticals - FMCG, Retail, Oil & Gas, Information Technology with a vast geographical reach in Russia, Kazakhstan, Ukraine & CIS, Central & Eastern Europe, Middle East & North Africa specialized in.

Specialties:

IT Consulting (SAP and Oracle EBS), Global Business Advisory, Market Intelligence & Research, Global Talent Acquisition
